definition: Tom Thumb (small person in folk tales)
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
finger/to point at or to/to indicate or refer to/to depend on/to count on/(of hair) to stand on end
to give a thumbs-up/to express one's approval

sentences.english: They might suck their thumb, seek out a blanket or so on.
sentences.chinese: 吮大拇指，或是去寻找毯子之类的。

sentences.english: Oliver wet his great thumb briefly.
sentences.chinese: 奥立佛凝神舐了一舐大拇指。

sentences.english: Bad music Anita, frequency Alice thumb.
sentences.chinese: 乐坏阿尼塔，频翘大拇指。

sentences.english: Malocclusion can be related to habits such as thumb sucking or premature loss of the deciduous (milk, baby) teeth.
sentences.chinese: 错颌畸形与一些习惯如允吸大拇指乳牙过早脱落有关。

sentences.english: The driver grinned and gave me a thumbs-up sign.
sentences.chinese: 汽车司机会意地咧嘴一笑，向我竖起大拇指。

sentences.english: Hold the fingers straight and then close them against the thumb.
sentences.chinese: 将四只手指竖直并拢并向大拇指方向闭合即可。

sentences.english: Bring the fingers and thumb together as if holding a phallus near the forehead.
sentences.chinese: 将四根手指和大拇指结成环状，就好像握住JB一样。

sentences.english: Vs with their thumbs and forefingers, measuring angles.
sentences.chinese: 鸟类学家们用大拇指和食指构成v形量测角度。

sentences.english: Ingrown toenails usually occur in the big toe.
sentences.chinese: 指甲内嵌通常发生在大拇指上。

sentences.english: Entering and opening clay for ceramic mugs can be done with the thumbs.
sentences.chinese: 进入开放的陶瓷杯黏土可以用大拇指。

sentences.english: And their finger length estimates got worse as they moved away from their thumbs.
sentences.chinese: 他们对手指长度估计随着他们从大拇指移开而变糟。

sentences.english: Rotate each ankle in a complete circle. Draw imaginary circles with the big toe five times.
sentences.chinese: 全方位旋转脚踝，想象用大拇指画圈五次。

sentences.english: Can keep dallying with the pen in him hand, let it circling thumb to turn.
sentences.chinese: 可以不停地玩弄自己手里的笔，让它绕着大拇指转。

sentences.english: Once in court, he gave a thumbs-up to associates in the public gallery.
sentences.chinese: 他一出现在法庭，就向旁听席的伙伴竖起大拇指。

sentences.english: I press the thumbtack into the board with thumb.
sentences.chinese: 我用大拇指将图钉按在木板上。

sentences.english: A bony bump at the base of the big toe, a bunion causes that toe to deviate toward the others.
sentences.chinese: 拇趾囊肿是指连接大拇指的骨头肿大而向外突出。

definition: to erect (a tent etc)/to prick up (one's ears)/to raise (one's eyebrows)/to stick up (one's thumb)/to turn up (one's collar)/(of a bird) to puff up (one's feathers)
to give a thumbs-up/to express one's approval
(idiom) a good person, used to praise sb's moral integrity or courage
